Items.Name: Disney - Quiz Engine
Items.SubHeader: Delivering a Powerful and Flexible Quiz Engine Software
Items.Excerpt: This project was involved heavy maintenance and a keen eye for detail while executing a complete revamp on the app that includes AA Level WCAG compliance, Quiz Analytics and also improving not only the user experience with voice overs but also the CMS user experience.
Items.Description: In 2017, Disney launched DisneyNOW, an app that replaced its Disney Channel, Disney XD, and Disney Junior apps. With the new app, Disney is bringing together movies, TV shows, and games from its three networks. Our team designed and developed a custom flexible quiz engine for the new DisneyNOW app, allowing users to test themselves and take quizzes about the Disney movie or TV show they just watched. This also includes a backend CMS for admin users to create custom quizzes.
Items.TheChallenge: Disney has had great success using online quizzes as a user-engagement tool, but with their outdated software, creating new quizzes and managing existing ones was time-consuming. The Disney team wanted to replace its outdated quiz engine with a more modern and flexible quiz engine that would allow them to manage their quizzes and track user engagement more easily. We worked with the Disney team to determine the overall look and feel of the app, the types of questions and responses, and the best way to record and export analytic data.
Items.OurSolution: Our team started the project by analyzing Disney’s existing quiz engine’s design and how users interacted with it. With this information, we were able to design and build a new quiz engine that took what was working and significantly expanded the functionality. Our team designed several different types of quizzes with varying question-and-answer responses.
Items.TheResults: Designed and developed to be a flexible solution, the new Disney quiz app features three types of quizzes: trivia, best match, and poll. Any type of quiz can use text, images, video, and audio for questions, answers, and a final response. With the new quiz engine, the Disney team can create new quizzes and hub themes and schedule quiz releases in coordination with television and streaming premieres. Disney administrators can also view and export reports for individual quizzes and view system-wide reports as well.

Items.Name: Workhorse Golfing Tour
Items.Excerpt: A complete app development that included integration of the Golf Genius API. Built for golfers to apply for Workhorse hosted golf tournaments. The functionality included submitting tee times and scores and viewing a leaderboard. This also included real time score submission on the course while working offline.
Items.Description: A complete app development that included integration of the Golf Genius API. Built for golfers to apply for Workhorse hosted golf tournaments. The functionality included submitting tee times and scores and viewing a leaderboard. This also included real time score submission on the course while working offline.

Items.Name: MNNTHBX - Man In The Box
Items.Excerpt: This project included a large e-commerce migration using MySQL queries. Initially we did not have access to their EC2 server due to a missing key file. I ended up having to regenerate their key to access the files. This is a custom WP Theme that has custom functionality such as smart search, smart filters and load more capabilities.
Items.Description: My main duties for this project consisted of organizing and deploying a custom Themed WordPress E-Commerce site.  I was provided a design and based a module approach developing everything from user to developer experience. The biggest hurdles for this project involces developing a fully custom header search features that also ties in with a smart filter incorporated on the shop page. The smart filter consists of simutaniously sorting products by category (make), publish date, sub category (model), ascending and descemdomg order. The second hurdle involved migrating 500 + products and orders from the old site flawlessly. A process of find a replace and working in SQL. The mission for MNNTHBX is to expand and promote the small bore scene. As enthusiasts, they’ve been involved in every segment of motorcycle riding and racing, but the small bore niche is simply about fun, and they like fun. MNNTHBX is driven by innovation, and will continually push to provide fresh, premium products and service. A boutique shop by design, we only manufacture and vend products we want to use ourselves. This format allows us avoid blanket sales pitches and truly stand behind everything we offer.

Items.Name: Standard Stealth
Items.Excerpt: A custom Wordpress theme development that involved migrating articles and additional content from drupal. This also included the development of a custom load more plugin and creating keyframe animations for various elements throughout the site.
Items.Description: A complete overview of this project included colloborating with the Senior Designer and Marketer in planning our execution with a block system, SEO and overall design elements that included heavy keyframe animations.

Items.Name: Helen Ross Mcnabb Center
